welcome.guide_1: Easy - Create Kanban-boards for personal and team projects
welcome.guide_2: Customize - Change board's background for intuitive navigation
welcome.guide_3: Visual - Create and change tasks, complete projects, meet deadlines
welcome.guide_4: Find - With our end-to-end search you can find tasks even faster
welcome.expired: Your token is expired! Please, login
welcome.teamAlla: Deployed application backend. Developed 'all boards' page and 'global search' page. Applied NgRx for 'all boards' page. For listed above pages implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, modals for boards creation / editing / deletion. Implemented universal interceptor for all network requests. Additional features - search page sorting, ability to change boards background.
welcome.teamSasha: Configured initial project setup. Held code-review during app developmant. Developed 'board details' page with drag-n-drop. Applied NgRx for 'board details' page. For listed above page implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, modals for column / task creation / editing / deletion. Additional features - ability to change board background at details page.
welcome.teamSveta: Responsible for application design. Developed 'sticky' header, footer, home page, login page, sign-up page, user profile page. Applied reactive forms with custom validation while development . For listed above pages implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, routing-guard. Implemented user session handling. Additional features - 404 page.

registration.title: Registration
registration.name: Enter your name
registration.tooltipPassword: Your password should contain at least 8 characters, a mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters, a mixture of letters and numbers, inclusion of at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ]
registration.tooltipLogin: Your login should contain from 3 to 30 characters
